resources.string: Every second counts when it\'s leading up to the moment when we finally meet 👀\n\nLet\'s countdown together and make every moment apart just a little bit sweeter! 🙃

string-array.name: timeToGo
string-array.item: Patience is not simply the ability to wait Ishu. 💫
The universe is full of magical things meow. ❤️
Waiting is the great vocation of the dispossessed. 🍪
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known. 🥳
Waiting for the spark from heaven to fall Ishika. 🌈
The best things in life often come after wait. ❄️
What is delayed is not lost meri jaan. 🎆
Life is always a matter of waiting for the right moment. 🥁
The world is all gates, all opportunities, strings of tension waiting to be struck. 🍭️
